docs.title: AWS S3 integration
docs.description: Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3) is storage for the internet. You can use Amazon S3 to store and retrieve any amount of data at any time, from anywhere on the web.

docs.title: AWS SES integration
docs.description: Amazon Simple Email Service enables you to send and receive email using a reliable and scalable email platform. Set up your custom Amazon simple email service account.

docs.title: Facebook integration guide
docs.description: Erxes app can be integrated with facebook developer API and that means we can receive our Facebook pages' inbox messages and posts directly to our erxes app's inbox. With the help of Facebook developer API we have many more possibilities, like receiving notifications about page comment, page post feed etc. There is an active development process going on this subject.

docs.title: Gmail integration guide
docs.description: Read and send messages, manage drafts and attachments, search threads and messages, work with labels, setup push notifications, and manage Gmail settings.

docs.title: Google Cloud Storage
docs.description: Cloud Storage provides worldwide, highly durable object storage that scales to exabytes of data. You can access data instantly from any storage class, integrate storage into your applications with a single unified API, and easily optimize price and performance.

docs.title: Nylas integrations
docs.description: Connect your application to every email, calendar, and contacts provider in the world. Learn how to integrate Nylas Accounts With Erxes.

docs.title: Twitter integration guide
docs.description: Erxes app can be integrated with twitter developer API and that means we can receive our twitter accounts DMs, Tweets directly into our erxes app's inbox.

docs.title: Overview
docs.description: Erxes helps you attract and engage more customers while giving you high lead conversion. With erxes, all your marketing, sales and customer service tools are merged into one platform for greater output.

docs.title: partner-agency
docs.description: |  | Bronze | Silver | Gold |

docs.title: Contacts
docs.description: Coordinate and manage your companies and customers in one go from company database. It enables you to filter companies and customers by websites, size, plan industry, session count in an more realistic way.

docs.title: Engage
docs.description: Start converting your prospects into potential customers through Email, SMS, Messenger or more interactions to drive them to a successful close.

docs.title: Initial Setup
docs.description: Brands, Channels and Integrations are the key components of erxes platform.

docs.title: Knowledge Base
docs.description: Real-time & two-way help center. Educate both your customers and staff by creating a help center related to your brands, products and services to reach higher level of satisfactions.

docs.title: Mobile Apps

docs.title: Sales pipeline
docs.description: Easy and clear sales funnels allow you to control your sales pipeline from one responsive field by precisely analyzing your progress and determining your next best move for success.

docs.title: Script installation
docs.description: In the case of web messenger, knowledgebase, popups, you have to install some scripts on your website's code.

docs.title: Segments
docs.description: A segment is smaller group of your contacts defined by rules or filters that you set. Coordinate and manage your companies and customers in one go from the company database. Erxes let you filter and segment an important group of data for targeted purposes such as by websites, size, plan industry, session count or some criteria in a more realistic way.

metadata.title: Install erxes with a 1-Click App on Heroku
metadata.description: Today, we’re delighted to announce that erxes is available on Heroku. It will enable teams to run erxes and collaborate in the cloud, thus creating a frictionless developer experience.

metadata.title: Erxes v0.13.0 release information
metadata.description: Welcome to the March 2020 release of Erxes. The number of updates and new features are highlighted in this version. Therefore, the breaking change has done in this release. Major features of the 0.13.0 series, compared to release 0.12.0\.

metadata.title: Erxes v0.12.0 release information
metadata.description: Erxes 0.12.0 release contains the number of new features, resolved issues and improvements. Therefore, the breaking changes has done in this release. Major features of the 0.12.0 series, compared to release 0.11.2\.
